other_tests.findings: Supraventricular tachycardia with a long RP interval.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Following administration of adenosine, there was a ventricular ectopic beat and a brief episode of atrial ectopy, after which sinus tachycardia emerged.

other_tests.findings: Blood thyrotropin level was undetectable; free thyroxine (T4) and total triiodothyronine (T3) levels were above the upper limit of quantification.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Results from a few months later suggest poor adherence to treatment, with high free T4 and total T3 levels.

other_tests.findings: Marked hyperemia throughout the entire gland, characteristic of Gravesâ€™ disease; mildly heterogeneous parenchymal echotexture.
